name: Windows Manage Inject in Memory Multiple Payloads
author: Carlos Perez <carlos_perez@darkoperator.com>
David Kennedy "ReL1K" <kennedyd013@gmail.com>
description:
This module will inject in to several processes a given
        payload and connecting to a given list of IP Addresses.
        The module works with a given lists of IP Addresses and
        process PIDs if no PID is given it will start a the given
        process in the advanced options and inject the selected
        payload in to the memory of the created module.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: PAYLOAD
options.description: Payload to inject in to process memory

options.name: LPORT
options.description: Port number for the payload LPORT variable.

options.name: IPLIST
options.description: List of semicolon separated IP list.

options.name: PIDLIST
options.description: List of semicolon separated PID list.

options.name: HANDLER
options.description: Start new exploit/multi/handler job on local box.

options.name: AMOUNT
options.description: Select the amount of shells you want to spawn.
